title.narrative: PROTECTION OP 2 QUALITY SERVICES

description.narrative: By 2023, access to improved integrated child protection prevention and response services is increased in target regions in both development and humanitarian setting, which contributes to Prevention Of Harmful Practice, Promotion Of Care, Mental Health And Psychosocial Well-Being And Justice, Protection From Violence, Exploitation, Abuse And Neglect. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2023, girls and boys in Madagascar, particularly the most vulnerable, are better protected from violence, exploitation, abuse, neglect and child marriage

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2023, access to improved integrated child protection prevention and response services is increased in target regions in bothdevelopment and humanitarian setting

description.narrative: 5,907 child victims of violence, exploitation and neglect received psychosocial, medical and/or legal support services through child protection networks, exceeding the annual RAM target of 5,000.; The national toll-free child helpline referred 480 cases to services, while the 6 one stop “Vonjy” centers provided integrated services for 1285 child victims of sexual violence. 171 members of fokontany level watch groups to refer cases and raise awareness were trained.6719 children received birth certificates. In an effort to improve quality of psycho-social support, 224 community social work volunteers were trained, and a partnership initiated with the National Order of Psychologists. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:10/01/2022
